prompts: Create a cute Pokemon that resembles a pink rabbit with fluffy ears and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that can heal others with soft, soothing sounds and has a gentle demeanor.
Design a bipedal Pokemon with large ears and a round body, perfect for cuddling.
Show me a happy, pink Pokemon that loves to play in grassy fields and help its friends.
Generate a Pokemon with a caring personality that can be found in urban areas, spreading joy.
Give me a fluffy creature that has a sweet smile and is often seen helping injured Pokemon.
Make a Pokemon that uses healing powers and has a charming, approachable appearance.
